Html:
Hello there,

The toolkit version 3.5.0.0 has StackedLineSeries but in the version 3.5.50211.1 from February 2010, it isn't there. Did it move to another clr-namespace? Or removed from toolkit?

Thanks in advance.

Hello again,

could someone help me? I need a chart with stacked columns, in an older version of the WPF Toolkit there are a StackedColumn class but in the newest release it seems to me that the class is removed.

Is their a reason that it removed or did the class just moved to another namespace?

Any help would be appreciated.
